config.coords_mod.title: Info Display Configuration
config.coords_mod.category.general.hud_i: Toggle the display of different information on the HUD
Shows the current FPS on the HUD
config.coords_mod.enable_coords.descript: Shows the player's coordinates on the HUD
config.coords_mod.enable_biome.descripti: Shows the player's current biome on the HUD
config.coords_mod.enable_direction.descr: Shows the player's facing direction (without up and down) on the HUD
config.coords_mod.enable_time.descriptio: Shows the real life time on the HUD
config.coords_mod.category.general.time_: Appearance and format of the time
config.coords_mod.show_ampm.description: Shows AM or PM when using 12 hour time format
config.coords_mod.show_seconds.descripti: Shows the seconds in the time info
config.coords_mod.time_format.descriptio: Toggle between 12 hour and 24 hour time format
config.coords_mod.order_list.description: Change the order of the displayed information
config.coords_mod.category.appearance.de: Change the color of the HUD
config.coords_mod.category.appearance.te: Customize the text displayed on the HUD
config.coords_mod.custom_fps_text.descri: Custom text to display for FPS. Example: "%s FPS" will display "60 FPS"
config.coords_mod.custom_coords_text.des: Custom text to display for coordinates. Example: "X: %s, Y: %s, Z: %s" will display "X: 0, Y: 0, Z: 0"
config.coords_mod.custom_biome_text.desc: Custom text to display for biome. Example: "%s Biome" will display "Plains Biome"
Custom text to display for direction. Example: "%s Direction" will display "North Direction"
config.coords_mod.custom_time_text.descr: Custom text to display for time. Example: "Time: %s" will display "Time: 12:00"
config.coords_mod.category.appearance.cu: [Info Display] Invalid format for custom text "%s". Please use "%s" for the value
config.coords_mod.pos_x.description: Absolute X position of the HUD. Position may change on screen resize
config.coords_mod.pos_y.description: Absolute Y position of the HUD. Position may change on screen resize
